abilities.name: Fire Formation
abilities.effect: Each of Charizard's attacks does 10 more damage for each Fire Pokémon on your Bench to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Burning Tail
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Charizard.

abilities.name: Snow Gift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Froslass from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Ground Frost
attacks.effect: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Magma Mantle
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. This attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire or Metal Energy card you discarded.

attacks.name: Primal Scythe
attacks.effect: You may discard Helix Fossil, Dome Fossil, or Old Amber from your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Rock Slide
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flash
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Gadget Bolt
attacks.effect: If Luxray has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, you may do 100 damage instead of 60 to the Defending Pokémon. If you do, discard that Pokémon Tool card.

attacks.name: Cloak Party
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Burmy and Wormadam, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Competitiveness
abilities.effect: If you don't have a Supporter card in play, each of Probopass's attacks does 30 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Top Chop
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Top Accelerator
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a basic Energy card, attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If that card isn't a basic Energy card, discard it. This power can't be used if Salamence is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Shoot Through
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Damage Roller
attacks.effect: Put damage counters on the Defending Pokémon until the Defending Pokémon has the same remaining HP as Swalot. (If the Defending Pokémon has the same or less remaining HP as Swalot, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Entangle Tackle
attacks.effect: You may do 50 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, this attack does 30 damage to 1 of your Pokémon, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

attacks.name: Leaf Guard
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Tangrowth by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Swallow Up
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokémon and Tangrowth. If the Defending Pokémon has fewer remaining HP than Tangrowth's, this attack does 120 damage instead.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Convert Blow
attacks.effect: If Toxicroak has any Psychic Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If Toxicroak has any Fighting Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Charge Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Zapdos .

attacks.name: Lightning Strike
attacks.effect: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to Zapdos . If you do, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 40.

abilities.name: Unearth
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Helix Fossil, Dome Fossil, or Old Amber, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Aerodactyl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Oracle Arrow
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Antigravity
attacks.effect: The Retreat Cost for Bronzong is 0 until the end of your next turn.

abilities.name: Cloudy Sky
abilities.effect: If any of your Grass Pokémon or Fire Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, reduce that damage by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Worry Seed
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Curse
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. This power can't be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Shadow Skip
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) You may switch Gengar with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sharpshooting
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Wreck
attacks.effect: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

attacks.name: Avalanche
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tumble Down
attacks.effect: Discard as many Fighting Energy cards as you like from your hand. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Fighting Energy cards you discarded.

attacks.name: Rock Tumble
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Push Out
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Vortex Chop
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Resistance, this attack's base damage is 120 instead of 60.

abilities.name: Relaxing Shower
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard an Energy card from your hand. If you do, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Lopunny is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hover Heal
attacks.effect: Remove all Special Conditions from Lopunny.

attacks.name: Second Bite
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Time Spiral
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Evolved Pokémon. Remove the highest Stage Evolution card from that Pokémon and have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Primal Tentacles
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Helix Fossil, Dome Fossil, and Old Amber in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Continuous Crush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.

attacks.name: Baby Steps
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

abilities.name: Dowsing Code
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Porygon-Z from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards, show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Boosted Voltage
attacks.effect: If Raichu has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that isn't an Evolved Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Thunder Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a Lightning Energy card attached to Raichu.

abilities.name: Wild Guard
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Rapidash by your opponent's Pokémon SP.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Recruit
attacks.effect: Look at your opponent's hand, choose a Supporter card you find there, and discard it. Then, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack.

attacks.name: Extend Fang
attacks.effect: If Raticate has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Leaf Blast
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the amount of Grass Energy attached to Sceptile.

attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.effect: You may attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dual Cut
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Darkness Grace
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) If you do, put 1 damage counter on Spiritomb. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Grovyle during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Endure
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, if Gulpin would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, Gulpin is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

abilities.effect: If Haunter is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Haunter is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Tongue Spring

attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.effect: If Shelgon has any basic Fire Energy and any basic Water Energy attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Beginning Door
cards.effect: Search your deck for Arceus, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Bench Shield
cards.effect:
Attach Bench Shield to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.
If that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.

cards.name: Buffer Piece
cards.effect:
Attach Buffer Piece to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.
If that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.

cards.name: Department Store Girl
cards.effect: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.

cards.name: Energy Restore
cards.effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, put a basic Energy card from your discard pile into your hand. If you don't have that many basic Energy cards in your discard pile, put all of them into your hand.

cards.name: Expert Belt
cards.effect:
Attach Expert Belt to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it. If
that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.

cards.name: Lucky Egg
cards.effect:
Attach Lucky Egg to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it. If
that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.

cards.name: Old Amber
cards.effect: Play Old Amber as if it were a Colorless Basic Pokémon. (Old Amber counts as a Trainer card as well, but if Old Amber is Knocked Out, this counts as a Knocked Out Pokémon.) Old Amber can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat. At any time during your turn before your attack, you may discard Old Amber from play. (This doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokémon.)

cards.name: Professor Oak's Visit
cards.effect: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.

cards.name: Ultimate Zone
cards.effect: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.

cards.name: Dome Fossil
cards.effect: Play Dome Fossil as if it were a Colorless Basic Pokémon. (Dome Fossil counts as a Trainer card as well, but if Dome Fossil is Knocked Out, this counts as a Knocked Out Pokémon.) Dome Fossil can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat. At any time during your turn before your attack, you may discard Dome Fossil from play. (This doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokémon.)

cards.name: Helix Fossil
cards.effect: Play Helix Fossil as if it were a Colorless Basic Pokémon. (Helix Fossil counts as a Trainer card as well, but if Helix Fossil is Knocked Out, this counts as a Knocked Out Pokémon.) Helix Fossil can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat. At any time during your turn before your attack, you may discard Helix Fossil from play. (This doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Compound Pain
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon that already has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Double Fall
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Salamence LV.X from your hand onto your Active Salamence, you may use this power. For each of your opponent's Pokémon that is Knocked Out by damage from Salamence's attacks this turn, take 1 more Prize card.

attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Salamence.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Energy attached to Arceus.

attacks.name: Fastwave

attacks.name: Sky Spear

attacks.effect: Switch Arceus with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
